attributes.action: Help airport staff and airports through pandemic
attributes.additional_details: The government has done nothing to help airports and hundreds of staff are now loosing jobs because of the government closing travel corridors and place countries on quarantine lists
attributes.background: Extend furlough for aviation and airport staff

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend furlough scheme for the UK Aviation sector to help stop redundancies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331434

Provide specific support for the UK Aviation industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553818
